thread.title: Wales edging closer to independence, David Davies claims
thread.title_full: Wales edging closer to independence, David Davies claims - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Wales edging closer to independence, David Davies claims
text: Wales is edging closer to independence, a senior Welsh Tory MP has claimed, amid plans for further devolution. New powers over energy, transport and running the assembly will be outlined in a draft Wales Bill on Tuesday. Monmouth MP David Davies said he was worried that devolution " is always a one-way street " . "No-one is talking about taking powers away from the Welsh government in areas where it is performing badly, such as health or education," he said. Share this story About sharing
